location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Stephen Watson Henshaw, Bushire to William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter concerns a dispute between Stephen Watson Henshaw, Marine Agent in the Persian Gulf, and Mohumed bin Naser [Muḥammad bin Nāṣir]; the latter claims that rent is owed to him by the Marine Agent for a property he occupies. The letter presents Mr Henshaw's view of the dispute and includes a request from him asking the Resident to represent his point of view to the Governor of Bombay.
